tasks.label: Docker: Build and Run
tasks.command: docker build -t kafka-cartographer . && docker run --rm -v "${workspaceFolder}:/app/scan" kafka-cartographer /app/scan

tasks.label: Serve Visualization (Docker)
tasks.command: docker stop kafka-cartographer-viz || true && docker build -f Dockerfile.visualization -t kafka-cartographer-web . && docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name kafka-cartographer-viz kafka-cartographer-web
